channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Putin Sees Ukraine Through a Lens of Grievance Over Lost Glory
item.description: Speaking after Friday’s summit, President Putin again implied that the war is all about Russia’s diminished status since the fall of the Soviet Union.

item.title: At Trump and Putin Summit, an Alaskan Halibut Dish Gets a Cameo
item.description: Halibut Olympia, a Tuesday-night kind of recipe, was part of the planning (if not the eating) at the Friday meeting.

item.title: Hundreds march to White House to protest Trump's D.C. crackdown
item.description: Protesters marched to the White House on Saturday as D.C. Metropolitan Police officers and National Park Service police looked on from a distance.

item.title: Jeanine Pirro Takes on Prosecutor Role in Trump’s D.C. Crackdown
item.description: As the U.S. attorney in Washington, Jeanine Pirro is a central player in a clash that could define her legacy: the president’s takeover of local law e...

item.title: The Power of the Trump-Putin Presidential Photo Op
item.description: At their meeting in Alaska, President Trump and President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia both understood the power of the summit’s imagery, regardless of...

item.title: U.S. Pauses Visitor Visas for Gazans After Laura Loomer Posts
item.description: The move blocked a pathway for those seeking medical care in the United States, including young children, who have arrived in recent weeks with seriou...

item.title: Putin Sees Ukraine Through a Lens of Grievance Over Lost Glory
item.description: Speaking after Friday’s summit, President Putin again implied that the war is all about Russia’s diminished status since the fall of the Soviet Union.

item.title: Generation X Needs to Stop Complaining
item.description: It’s fine to make room for the next generation.

item.title: China’s Biotech Is Cheaper and Faster Than America’s
item.description: China’s biotechnology sector has established a bright future by focusing not on breakthrough cures and treatments but on speed and efficiency.

item.title: Video shows prominent Palestinian prisoner for the first time in years
item.description: The world got a glimpse of Marwan Barghouti for the first time in years in a video of a far-right Israeli minister berating him.

item.title: State Department halts 'medical-humanitarian' visas for people from Gaza
item.description: The U.S. State Department says it's halting visas for visitors from Gaza as it reviews its process for granting visas for medical evacuees.

item.title: Immigration arrests dip in July, and activists hope they're partly responsible
item.description: Immigration arrests falter in July after a big push for mass deportations in June. Activists in sanctuary jurisdictions hope their resistance plays a ...

item.title: Government forces Air Canada flight attendants back to work, into arbitration
item.description: Canada's government forced Air Canada and its striking flight attendants back to work and into arbitration Saturday after a work stoppage stranded mor...

item.title: Trump Backs Off Cease-Fire Demand in Ukraine War, Aligning With Putin
item.description: President Trump’s break from a strategy agreed to with European allies could give President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia an edge as talks to end the fi...

item.title: Israel Gears Up for Nationwide Strike to Support Hostages
item.description: Nearly two years of demonstrations have failed to push Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to reach a deal with Hamas that would end the war and free th...
